rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes the nature of cases without high-potency language.
The segment states what the cases have not been ('has been an actual influenza infection').
Segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports the cases 'has not been an actual influenza infection', which is a bare negation handled under Q7.
The segment contains the bare negation 'Neither of these two cases has been an actual influenza infection' without an explicit calming cue.
